12423.name: Training Room of Perpetual Carnage
description: {*You enter the room from the training room and the walls have large
{*{Rs{rp{*i{Rk{re{*s{* protruding out with fresh blood dripping from them, it almost
{*looks like someone had imploded and there insides were all over the
{*walls. In the middle of the blood {ws{Wo{wa{Wk{we{Wd{* room is a beautiful woman
{*whom has her back to you. Her long and slender legs catch your
{*attention and seem to pull you closer, before you realize what you
{*are doing you are right behind her. The slim woman spins around and
{*slashes your cheek with a razor sharp {Bd{Ya{yg{Yg{be{Br{*.{x

12405.name: {BThe Swirling Vortex!{x
description: {*This bizarre tunnel is obviously a wormhole through another plane.
The ground sticks to your boots like dead flesh, and the dull grey
substance that composes the walls shimmers and swirls.  There is but
one way to go- forward.

12418.name: {BHallway of Destruction{x
description: {*You have reached the end of the hall, the walls are decorated in hand
{*carved marble and laced with {Wp{wl{Wa{wt{Wi{wn{Wu{wm{* filigree. At the back wall there
{*is a large hanging tapestry displaying the picture of a great massacre
{*by the hands of the {bT{Ba{Yl{yos{Yi{Ba{bn{* army against the Church of Strife during
{*the Long War.{x

12495.name: {BHall of Storms{X
description: {*A mass of storm clouds gather above you in this very tall chamber.
The smell of wet dirt and ozone are all around you and gusty winds
pound against you.  Simply being in this room you are filled with the
destructive lust of Talos, so much so that you are now empowered to
rush out and fight those who oppose you and the wishes of your master.

12467.name: {BHall of Lightning{x
description: {*Torches line the walls of this hall, and the smell of burning
naphta begins to make it presence known, singing your nostrils.
Wooden trim decorates this hall, and the stillness of the air gives
you the feeling of isolation.

12493.name: {*The {bO{Bf{*fi{Bc{be {*of {bN{Be{*r{Yl{yi{Yt{*h{x
description: {*Darkness dominates. The walls are covered with a layer of b{wl{*ac{wk {*M{war{*bl{we{*
{*which absorbs most of the light. In the center of the room stands a large
{*desk. Covered with all kinds of documents. There hangs a painting on each
{*of the three blind walls. One is a picture of Three {bL{Bigh{yt{Yn{Wi{wn{Wg{Yb{yo{Blt{bs{* arcing
{*into someones body. Some sort of {*dark {Bt{*a{Yl{*o{Bs{bian {*ritual{* is performed on the
{*second painting.  {RD{re{Ra{rth{* and {bD{Be{*s{Yt{Wr{yu{Wc{Yt{*i{Bo{bn{*  is all that is shown on the last
{*one. At the left side of the door,a wooden board is placed with all kinds
{*of {ymaps {*and {Bb{blu{Bep{bri{Bnts{* pinned to it.  {RR{red {Rd{ro{Rt{rs {*mark some targets on them.
{*The only way in or out is through the large {wb{*la{wc{*k door to the south.

12433.name: {BThe Church Armory{x
description: {*This is the {BC{bh{yu{Yr{bc{Bh {*A{wr{*m{Wo{*r{wy{*.  Here you may equip yourself with top of
{*the line armor and weapons, to better spread the message of {BT{*a{Yl{*o{Bs{*.  A
{*small breeze flits through the room, causing a bizarre whistling noise
{*that seems to whisper to you {W"{bS{*t{Bo{*r{bm{ws{*...  {*R{be{wb{Be{*l{Bl{wi{*o{bn{*...
{BD{be{*s{yt{Yr{Wu{Yc{yt{*i{bo{Bn{W"{x

12490.name: {BA path through Destruction{x
description: {*Walking down the hall silent sounds of {Rsc{rre{*ams and bones {bcr{Bus{*hing echo
{*from deep within. On the walls are tapestries of glorious battles
{*that took place years and years ago. The cold floor seems to chill your
{*boots as you walk, forming a light m{wi{*s{wt.{x

12447.name: Wermidon's Office
description: As you enter this room, You can feel the {4e{Bs{*s{&e{*n{Bc{4e{x of something
{*c{7h{&aot{7i{*c{x and {4d{Be{*s{#t{&r{*u{&c{#t{*i{Bv{4e{x.  In the middle of the room stands huge {*black
oak desk{x, carved with {6s{^i{&lv{^e{6r{x runes.  The walls of this room are
surrounded by large bookshelves, full of {3b{#o{&o{#k{3s{x and other {5m{%y{5s{%t{5e{%r{5i{%o{5u{%s{x
items.  Behind the desk there is large {*statue{x of a man, dressed in
{*black plate mail{x.  This is the {*statue{x of the {*St{7o{#r{BmL{*ord{x, the one-eyed
{4D{Be{#s{&t{*r{&o{#y{Be{4r{x.  Near the roof there is a small {4s{Bt{&o{Br{4m{x raging around, the
{3l{#i{7g{&htn{7i{#n{3g {4b{Bolt{4s{x give dim {4b{Blu{4e light in the room when they {&f{Bl{&a{Bs{&h{x.  On
the floor there is large carved {*s{7y{&mb{7o{*l{x that {&s{#h{&i{#n{&e{#s {6b{^r{&ight{^l{6y{x.
This large statue is over 7 feet tall.  It shows a muscular one
eyed man in black plate mail.  The armor is carved with silver runes.
In the right hand the statue holds a large black Quarterstaff and in
his left, he has a small wand.  His only eye glows with blue light and
his face is etched in an evil, wicked smile.  This is a statue of
Talos, The Destroyer.
*        WWW                    WWW         *
*         WWW                  WWW          *
*          WWW      WWWW      WWW           *
*           WWW    WWWWWW    WWW            *
*            WWW  WWWWWWWW  WWW             *
*             WWWWWW    WWWWWW              *
*              WWWW      WWWW               *
*               WW        WW                *

12494.name: {BThe office of {-N{-o{-s{-t{-r{-a{-d{-o{-m{-u{-s{x
description: {*A rush of {Gw{gee{Gd{* smoke enters your nostrils as you enter this
{*wildly decorated room. There is a large hookah in the corner
{*constantly pumping {Bb{blu{Be{* smoke into the air. On the floor
{*there are large bean bags make of slik, filled with the
{*finest of beads. The desk in the back is more of a couch
{*with a c{wu{Wr{wv{*ing table in the front. The walls have a few
{*paintings of important people and events, the one that sticks
{*out the most is a picture of a weed leaf behind the chair.{x

12484.name: {BHall of Bones{x
description: {* Here, the bones scattered about the floor become slightly more
sparse.  Yet still, you can not progress without stepping on the dead,
and the sickening crunch that follows is unavoidable.  The hazy smell
of mildew continues, its source not entirely unknown.  Tapestries
continue to line the walls, veiling alcoves and possibly entrances to
other areas within the catacombs...  The tapestries of this room seem
rotten here, and whatever it was that they once depicted is now lost
to the sands of time.

12400.name: {*Gates of the {bF{Bo{8r{Wtr{8e{Bs{bs {8of {bD{Be{8s{3t{#r{7u{#c{3t{8i{Bo{bn{0
description: {*Here, a large structure stands within the gardens.  Pillars reach
up to the darkened skies, and the steel doors into the fortress stand
resolutely closed.  The storm continues to rage, whipping thorns and
other organic debris about the air, scratching your face and hands.
Two guards mill about, calm within the furious storm, as if they were
used to such things.  Seeing you, they utter a short prayer to Talos,
and strike.

12476.name: Hall of Fury
description: {*The winds whips furiously here, becoming almost visible
in the pale light you provide to this dark place.  The black walls of
this room seem to contort with the wind, eager to crush you.

12425.name: {BHall of Storms{x
description: {*A mass of storm clouds gather above you in this very tall chamber.
{*The smell of wet dirt and ozone are all around you and gusty winds
{*pound against you.  Simply being in this room you are filled with the
{*destructive lust of Talos, so much so that you are now empowered to
{*rush out and fight those who oppose you and the wishes of your master.{x

12440.name: {BShrine room to {gM{wa{yl{wa{gr{x
description: {*A dark and deadly m{wi{Ws{wt{* flows around the room rumbling
{*like a magnificent beast every now and again sending
{*a chill to your bones and almosts freezes you to the
{*floor. A large impressive statue of the God {gM{wa{yl{wa{gr{* rests
{*in the center of the room covered in fresh blood. Malar
{*the god of the hunt and savage beasts that dwell in
{*the {Rs{roul{Rs{* of those true to battle.{X

12446.name: {BJunction of Sacrafice and Destruction{x
description: {*Colorfull sprites and {-f{-a{-e{-r{-i{-e{-s{* gleam the hallway as you travel. The sound
{*of swords clanging in glorious battle errupt all around you. To the west
{*you can smell the sweet taste of cooking {Yf{yo{Yo{yd{* and you can hear the
{*bubbling of a large fountain. In the south you can see a faint shilouette
{*of a large {Bp{Yi{yt{* surrounded by color.{x

12430.name: {*A Path to {bE{Bt{Ye{yr{Yn{Ba{bl {*Doom{x
description: {*The walls of the cavern are made of a roughly cut
{*stone that seems to absorb the light from any torch.
{*The path is covered in a foot of water and small
{*eels swim around at your feet. As you walk on the
{*turns become more frequent and seem to lead nowhere.{x

12408.name: {BThe Swirling Vortex!{x
description: This bizarre tunnel is obviously a wormhole through another plane.
The ground sticks to your boots like dead flesh, and the dull grey
substance that composes the walls shimmers and swirls.  There is but
one way to go- forward.

12471.name: Hall of Fury
description: {*The winds whips furiously here, becoming almost visible
in the pale light you provide to this dark place.  The black walls of
this room seem to contort with the wind, eager to crush you.

12485.name: {BHall of Destruction{x
description: {*As you enter this hallway, You can feel the essence of something
chaotic and destructive. The walls of this room are surrounded by
silver runes and pentagrams. Near the roof there is a small storm
raging around, the lightning bolts give dim blue light in the room
when they flash.

12421.name: {*A Path to {bE{Bt{Ye{yr{Yn{Ba{bl {*Doom{x
description: {*The walls of the cavern are made of a roughly cut
{*stone that seems to absorb the light from any torch.
{*The path is covered in a foot of water and small
{*eels swim around at your feet. As you walk on the
{*turns become more frequent and seem to lead nowhere.{x

12404.name: {8?UNKNOWN?{x
description: {8Gray {0mist blurs your vision as you hover on what appears to be a
{7fluffy {0surface.  {BThunder {0rolls about you and {#lightning {0flashes {8darkly
{0in the sky.  Rolling {Bs{#t{3o{#r{Bm {7clouds {0extend before you as far as the eye
can see.{x

12458.name: Verra's Temple
description: {*As you enter the room, you stand in awe as you notice three
{bm{yu{Yl{yt{Bi{*-{Bc{bo{yl{Yo{yr{Be{bd {Yl{Wi{yg{wh{Yt{wn{yi{Wn{Yg {Yb{yo{wl{Yt{ws{* converging into the center of the room,
{*energizing it. Looking towards the back of the room, you see a {wstatue
{*of a {rd{Re{*m{Wo{rn {*goddess. You then kneel down and start chanting, trying to
{*summon her. Soon the {wstatue {*starts to turn to life, and a very
{*beautiful woman emerges. She asks you in a soothing and gentle voice,
{*{W"{wWhy have you summoned me?{W"{x

12448.name: {BHall of Destruction{x
description: {*As you enter this hallway, You can feel the essence of something
chaotic and destructive. The walls of this room are surrounded by
silver runes and pentagrams. Near the roof there is a small storm
raging around, the lightning bolts give dim blue light in the room
when they flash.

12420.name: Catacombs Beneath The Cathedral
description: The alcoves in this region of the catacombs are placed close
together, as if the bodies were stacked like bricks to block the way
of some foul beast come to destroy them in the afterlife.  A single,
solid wooden pole is here, supporting a weak spot in the ceiling.  The
catacombs continue to the east and the west.

12403.name: {8?UNKNOWN?{x
description: {8Gray {0mist blurs your vision as you hover on what appears to be a
{7fluffy {0surface.  {BThunder {0rolls about you and {#lightning {0flashes {8darkly
{0in the sky.  Rolling {Bs{#t{3o{#r{Bm {7clouds {0extend before you as far as the eye
can see.{x

12472.name: Hall of Fury
description: {*The winds whips furiously here, becoming almost visible
in the pale light you provide to this dark place.  The black walls of
this room seem to contort with the wind, eager to crush you.

12469.name: {BHall of Lightning{x
description: {*Torches line the walls of this hall, and the smell of burning
naphta begins to make it presence known, singing your nostrils.
Wooden trim decorates this hall, and the stillness of the air gives
you the feeling of isolation.

12482.name: {BHall of Bones{x
description: {*The bones crunch under your step, and the lingering odor of mildew
persists to choke your nostrils.  Small alcoves line the walls, hiding
other bodies and bones in rotted clothing.  More tapestries are hung
on the walls to the east and south, veiling the entrances to tombs and
other crypts.

12428.name: {*A Path to {bE{Bt{Ye{yr{Yn{Ba{bl {*Doom{x
description: {*The walls of the cavern are made of a roughly cut
{*stone that seems to absorb the light from any torch.
{*The path is covered in a foot of water and small
{*eels swim around at your feet. As you walk on the
{*turns become more frequent and seem to lead nowhere.{x

12498.name: free room
description: Here, the ground begins a subtle but steady slope upwards.  The
alcoves lining the wall become fewer between one another, and the
ground seems slightly moister here.  The catacombs continue to the
north, and to the south the Cathedral awaits your approach.

12444.name: {BCenter of Distant Lands{x
description: {*You stand in a large room.  Blue and gold ovular discs line the
{*walls, each opening and closing like giant winking eyes, showing
{*you the way to other lands.  A stiarcase leads East to a portal,
{*which blinks briefly with a vision of the Temple of {BT{ya{Yl{yo{Bs{* in
{*Westbridge. The Western wall displays the image of the Anarchist
{*Breweries in {RTo{rrr{Weg{ria{Rno{*, and the northern wall shows the amazing
{*{BMu{bse{Bum{* of Creatures.  And, lastly, the wall south of you shimmers
{*irridescently with visions of the city of {wZ{*o{wz{*o{* in silver moonlight.{x

12401.name: {8?UNKNOWN?{x
description: {8Gray {0mist blurs your vision as you hover on what appears to be a
{7fluffy {0surface.  {BThunder {0rolls about you and {#lightning {0flashes {8darkly
{0in the sky.  Rolling {Bs{#t{3o{#r{Bm {7clouds {0extend before you as far as the eye
can see.{x

12416.name: {*A Path to {bE{Bt{Ye{yr{Yn{Ba{bl {*Doom{x
description: {*The walls of the cavern are made of a roughly cut
{*stone that seems to absorb the light from any torch.
{*The path is covered in a foot of water and small
{*eels swim around at your feet. As you walk on the
{*turns become more frequent and seem to lead nowhere.{x

12455.name: Shrine of {BT{*a{#l{*o{Bs{x
description: {*A huge bath dominates this room.  In the center of the bath stands
an enormous obsidian statue.  The statue is of a broad-shouldered,
bearded young man with a single good eye, the other covered by a dark
patch.  He is dressed in a half-suit of field plate armor worn over
smooth leather armor and gloves.  As you stand there in awe at the
statue you swear you hear a voice whisper "{BGo and destroy, my
faithful{*" but it easily could have been the strange wind whipping
about the room.  {X
{W6.  Wipe
{*    6.1 {wIn case of severe tresspassing of these policies the
{w    leaders hold the right to request a wipe of a member and
{w    possibly one or more of this member's alts in the church.
{*    6.2 {wAll the leaders have to agree on the wipe of every
{w    single character, a majority is not enough.
{W7.  Clan Ranks
{*    7.1 {wLeaders can award specific members with a clan rank.
{w    Each rank can contain special privileges and/or duties.
{w    The leaders can also strip a rank from a member.
{*    7.2 {wspecial privileges and/or duties regarding a rank
{w    cannot be a contradiction of their regular equivalents. and
{w    do not change voting rights and can always be overruled by
{w    a majority of the leaders.
{*    7.3 {wRanks:
{w     #      Fighter                    Spellcaster
{w     0      Soldier                    Battlemage
{w     1      Assassin                   Stormcaster
{w     3      Destroyer                  Destroyer
{w     4      Warlord                    High Priest
{w     5      Stormknight                Storm Herald
{w    Rank #4 is vice-leader which is given to a member who will
{w    replace a specific leader during absense. Rank #5 is leaders.
{*    7.4 {wSubranks:
{w    ranks 0-3 have 3 subranks:
{w     * Adept       (A)
{w     * Experienced (E)
{w     * Master      (M)
{*    7.5 {wranks 0-3 can be given to any member by leaders at any
{w    given time. For demoting a member, a majority of leaders has
{w    to agree.
{*    7.6 {wRanks 0-3 have no special rights and rank cannot be used to
{w    command lower ranks. Ranks are character based and not player
{w    based. If one of your characters receives a rank this does not
{w    mean that your alts will receive an equivalent rank.
{*    7.7 {wRanks will be displayed in a bracket and every member will
{w    have a rank. If the member already has a bracket or later wants
{w    to change it to a custom bracket, they are required to have
{w    their rank somewhere in their description.
{X
{W3.  Leadership
{*    3.1 {wThe church will always have 3 leaders. If a leader will
{w    be absent for a longer period of time, this leader selects
{w    a member to be represented by while the leader is gone. If
{w    the leader resigns, this leader will pick a successor. In
{w    case the leader does not select a successor, one is selected
{w    by the remaining two leaders.
{*    3.2 {wLeaders are considered members with their rights and
{w    duties along with the privileges, duties and responsibility
{w    that comes with the rank in regards to everything in which
{w    the church as an entity is involved. The leaders hold the
{w    final decision on all clan matters.
{W4.  Applications
{w    4.1 If a character wants to join the Church of Destruction,
{w    they are required to write an RP application note to
{w    Talosclan. In the first week after receiving the note, the
{w    applicant will be tested. In the following week, members
{w    will be able to cast a vote on the applicant, after which
{w    the leaders will decide if there will be an interview.
{*    4.2 {wAfter the interview, a majority of leaders will decide
{w    if the applicant will be allowed to become a member.
{W5.  Declanning
{*    5.1 {wTo leave the Church of Destruction, a reroll is required.
{w    This rule is enforced by the immortals.
{*    5.2 {wA majority of leaders can decide to declan a member
{w    without enforcing the reroll rule.
{*    5.3 {wAfter a member had 1 year (365 days) of inactivity, this
{w    member will be removed from the clan without forced reroll,
{w    unless arrangements were made with the leaders or the leaders
{w    decide otherwise.
{*    5.4 {wAfter at least having aged 100 years in the church, a
{w    member will be allowed to leave without reroll, unless there
{w    have been severe violations of these policies.
{x'read tab3' for the next tablet
{R  Clan Policies
{W 1. The Church
{w    The Church of Destruction is a PK and RP clan of which it's
{w    members worship the stormlord, Talos. Some just PK, some
{w    mainly RP and others combine them. Both ways of playing are
{w    respected by the church and it's members.
{W 2. Membership
{w    {*2.1{w Each member has the right to vote on polls issued by the
{w    leaders. Votes can be cast publicly to talosclan or directly
{w    to the leaders if privacy is required. The results of a
{w    poll are used to make a decision on the subject at hand.
{w    But these results are vetoable by a majority of leaders.
{*    2.2 {wAll members are responsible for upholding the good name
{w    of the church. If possible, internal issues should be dealt
{w    with internally. Whining or bitching on public channels is
{w    frowned upon. It only shows weakness which is not what this
{w    church is about.
{*    2.3 {wMight a member need to contact the immortals about a
{w    clan related issue which cannot be addressed by the leaders,
{w    they should if possible contact an immortal associated with
{w    the clan before turning to other immortals.
{*    2.4 {wAll members are expected to respect eachother. In case
{w    of issues, talk to a leader, a clanrelated immortal or if
{w    neccesary another immortal considering 2.2 and 2.3.
{*    2.5 {wMembers should refrain from speaking in the church's
{w    name without the consent of a leader.
{*    2.6 {wActive RP is not enforced, however each member is required
{w    to have a decent description.
{*    2.7 {wEach member has the right to attend to applicant interviews
{w    but are required to remain silent if asked by a leader. After
{w    the interview, members are encouraged to give their oppinion.
{*    2.8 {wMembers cannot have pkers in other clans to avoid any
{w    conflicts of interest. They are also not allowed to pk other
{w    members without their consent.
{*    2.9 {wMembers are required to respect the rules of Waterdeep.
{x'read  tab2' for the next tablet.

12410.name: {BHall of Bones{x
description: {*With each stomach turning step, the smell of mildew and death
grows stronger.  Bones continue to litter the floor, one in
particular standing out in this room.  A leg bone, split open,
the rotten marrow protruding from the broken limb, jabs out into
the air at you from a darkened alcove in the wall.  Tapestries
continue to cover portions of the walls in this section of the
hallway, depicting gruesome catastrophes of nature and bestial
destruction.

12461.name: {BHall of Storms{x
description: {*A mass of storm clouds gather above you in this very tall chamber.
{*The smell of wet dirt and ozone are all around you and gusty winds
{*pound against you.  Simply being in this room you are filled with the
{*destructive lust of Talos, so much so that you are now empowered to
{*rush out and fight those who oppose you and the wishes of your master.{x

12480.name: {BHall of Fury{x
description: {*The winds whip about more furiously here, becoming almost visible
in the pale light you provide to this dark place.  The black walls of
this room seem to contort with the wind, eager to crush you.

12442.name: {BHall of Destruction{x
description: {*As you enter this hallway, You can feel the essence of something
chaotic and destructive. The walls of this room are surrounded by
silver runes and pentagrams. Near the roof there is a small storm
raging around, the lightning bolts give dim blue light in the room
when they flash.

12412.name: {BHall of choice{x
description: {*The hallway rounds off in a bend leading in two different directions.
{*The path to the west echo's with screams and sounds of {bm{Bu{*t{Yi{yla{Yt{*i{Bo{bn{*,
{*and you can here the tussle of clan members engaged in the {*{Yp{yra{gct{yic{Ye{*
{*room. Up abvove noises semm to come from far off lands.{x

12427.name: {*A Path to {bE{Bt{Ye{yr{Yn{Ba{bl {*Doom{x
description: {*The walls of the cavern are made of a roughly cut
{*stone that seems to absorb the light from any torch.
{*The path is covered in a foot of water and small
{*eels swim around at your feet. As you walk on the
{*turns become more frequent and seem to lead nowhere.{x

12488.name: {BThe Centerhall of Chaos{x
description: {*Continuing down the path of marble flooring and {bt{Ba{*p{Ye{yst{Yr{*i{Be{bd{* walls
{*the continuing screams seem to get louder and louder. There are
{*doors around you that may lead into places that you had wish you
{*could only forget, but you cannot. A constant airflow of a draft
{*{Bs{bl{ri{*th{re{br{Bs{* around your legs and feet making them goosebump.{x

12479.name: {BHall of Fury{x
description: {*The winds whip about more furiously here, becoming almost visible
in the pale light you provide to this dark place.  The black walls of
this room seem to contort with the wind, eager to crush you.

12422.name: {BGuildmasters room and Training Area{x
description: {*A swarm of small {bt{Bo{*r{Yn{ya{Yd{*o{Be{bs{* spin and circle the room in a deadly
{*dance of destruction.  The walls are a mosaic of Talos and his minions
{*at work.  The mosaics are ever-changing, depicting at the current
{*moment some of Talos' children at their chaotic best.  One scene has a
{*woman dressed only in a thin linen dress while she brings forth a
{*massive blizzard on a hapless village.  Another shows a dark haired
{*young man, with a rage in his eye, summoning a great {bh{Bu{*r{Yr{*i{Yc{*a{Bn{be{* to
{*ravage the coast.  And a naked man, with a long white beard, giggling
{*like a hyena as he splits the ground in two, making everything for
{*miles shake and rock till the structures tumble to the ground, as if
{*swallowed by {BT{yo{Yr{yi{Bl{* itself.{x

12452.name: {BHall of Storms{X
description: {*A mass of storm clouds gather above you in this very tall chamber.
The smell of wet dirt and ozone are all around you and gusty winds
pound against you.  Simply being in this room you are filled with the
destructive lust of Talos, so much so that you are now empowered to
rush out and fight those who oppose you and the wishes of your master.

12441.name: {BHall of Destruction{x
description: {*As you enter this hallway, You can feel the essence of something
chaotic and destructive. The walls of this room are surrounded by
silver runes and pentagrams. Near the roof there is a small storm
raging around, the lightning bolts give dim blue light in the room
when they flash.

12466.name: {BHall of Lightning{x
description: Torches line the walls of this hall, and the smell of burning
naphta begins to make it presence known, singing your nostrils.
Wooden trim decorates this hall, and the stillness of the air gives
you the feeling of isolation.

12445.name: {BHall of Storms{X

12411.name: {BHall of Bones{x
description: {*Here, the bones scattered about the floor become slightly more
sparse.  Yet still, you can not progress without stepping on the dead,
and the sickening crunch that follows is unavoidable.  The hazy smell
of mildew continues, its source not entirely unknown.  Tapestries
continue to line the walls, veiling alcoves and possibly entrances to
other areas within the catacombs...  The tapestries of this room seem
rotten here, and whatever it was that they once depicted is now lost
to the sands of time.

12438.name: {BAltar Room of {bD{Be{*s{Yt{Wr{yu{Wc{Yt{*i{Bo{bn{x
description: {*A large onyx altar is in the middle of the room soaked
{*in the {Rb{rloo{Rd{* of sacrifices to the stormlord {BT{Ya{yl{Yo{Bs{*. All
{*around the room are lit candles giving off erie glows
{*and s{wh{Wa{*d{wo{Ww{*ing events of Mayhem and Chaos. A large curved
{*dagger sits on the face of the altar ready to be plunged
{*into the heart of a foolish {Ys{you{Yl{*.{x
{x

12462.name: Hall of Fury
description: Raging winds beat at you from all sides, all but hurling you
against the walls of this small chamber.  The black, even surface of
the walls gleam eerily at you in the darkness, showing the way further
into the furious tombs below.  Exits lie above and to the east.

12435.name: {BThe Destroyers Flag Room{x
description: {*A black shroud of cold air and mist surround you as you drop into
{*a cellar like room. The walls are damp and water is dripping all
{*around. The floor is a rough rock with jagged spikes of minerals
{*pertruding from the floor, ceeling, and roof. On the walls are
{*flags that have been taken from various clans. In the back of the
{*room with a glow of light shining on it is a dark steel chest
{*with an enormous key lock on the face, only Treasure or danger
{*may lie in such a protected container.

12413.name: {BCouncil Of Destruction Meeting Hall{x

{*of a massive room. The walls are lined with tapestries of past battles
{*and glorious leaders standing over a battlefield in triumph. In the

{*statues. The chairs Are also oak and recline, they are covered in
{*plush {Bk{ye{Yn{yk{Bu {*feathers. Hanging from the celing of the room is a large
{*chandelier lit by a thousand candles. Chained to the corner is a mean
{*looking 3 headed monster chewing on {yg{go{wb{yl{gi{wn{ys {*bones.{x

12463.name: {BThe office of {BB{ya{Yl{yo{Bs{x

{*room is a shade of black m{wa{*r{wb{*le instead of white. Decorated on the walls
{*are paintings of many past victorioos battles and a large picture of

{*the seat is set on a stone pedastil so it rotates and reclines. The floor

12491.name: {BClan Mess Hall{x
description: {*The intoxicating smell of steaks and baking fills your noistrils and
{*sends your tastebuds swooning with desire. A short one eyed goblin
{*is seen running around behind the tall counter cooking the meals and
{*preparing the dishes. He notices you entering the room and yells out
{*"{wHurry's ands buy somethingz alreday, you cant be killing nobody
{*{wwith on da empty stomach{*" and with that he throws a carrot at you
{*and continues cooking.{x

12457.name: {BDestructive Magic{x
description: {*This small shop is clearly dedicated to {BT{ya{Yl{yo{Bs{* and his clergy.  The
{*walls are lined with blue and gold trim, and the small counter is
{*emblazoned with small grey runes, interspersed with the emblem of
{*Talos- three {Yl{yi{wg{Yt{yn{wi{Yn{yg{* bolts radiating from a central point.  The many
{*vials and elixirs that litter the counter-top come in varying shades
{*of blue, gold, and a bizarre silver-grey.  A priestess of Talos grins
{*wickedly as you enter, anticipating the destruction her brews will aid
{*you in causing.{x

12454.name: Stable of Storms
description: This is where the pets of the clergy are raised, groomed, and
trained to obey their masters.  Wooden posts hold up the wooden roof,
and small chambers are all around you.  A small ladder leads up to the
room above, where the pets are displayed for purchase.

12489.name: {BSparring room of Destruction{x
description: {*Great {bp{Bi{Yl{yl{Ya{Br{bs{* rise from the marble floor, to the arched ceiling
{*high above.  Black silk lines every wall, mysterious runes of some
{*kind woven into the dark fabric. In the middle of the room stands
{*a tall priestess with long draping robes. As you enter the room
{*she nods to you then removes her cloak to present battle armor
{*and a large broadsword.{x

12439.name: {BShrine room to {BT{Ya{yl{Yo{Bs{x
description: {*The feeling of entering the eye of an enourmous Twister
{*rushes to your head as you enter a room dedicated to
{*the Mighty Stormlord {BT{Ya{yl{Yo{Bs{*. All around you the walls
{*are electrified, firing off bolts of lightning to a
{*large o{wn{Wy{wx{* statue of the Stormlord. Below the statue
{*is the crest of the Church of Talos, Three {Yl{yi{wg{Wh{Yt{yn{wi{Wn{Yg
{*bolts {Re{rr{*rupti{rn{Rg{* from the ground.{x

12481.name: {BHall of Bones{x
description: {*Rotten bones litter the floor and the alcoves of the wall, in
various states of decay.  The smell of mildew hangs rankly on the
air,and the loose sand of the floor feels as if it has breached
the seams of your armor and clothing.  Tapestries depicting storms
and other natural disasters hang on the sides of the walls

12453.name: {BA Mount shop{x
description: {*From the {Wm{wa{*r{Wb{wl{*e {*slave-carved halls in the east you enter a dark and
{*damp cave where the water is leaking from the cealing and only 4
{*beams are perventing your demise. There are cages set up with dark
{*{bs{Bt{*o{Yrm{*i{Bn{bg {*clouds inside them blasting lighting out and growling
{*thunderous howls. There is an old Human man sitting behind a desk
{*made out of crates sipping some {Yg{Bi{bn {*and reading the Westbridge Times.
{*He looks at you carefully thinking how much money of yours he will
{*be able to squeaze out of your pocket.{x

12475.name: Hall of Fury

12483.name: {bHall of Bones{x
description: {*With each stomach turning step, the smell of mildew and death grows
stronger.  Bones continue to litter the floor, one in particular
standing out in this room.  A leg bone, split open, the rotten marrow
protruding from the broken limb, jabs out into the air at you from a
darkened alcove in the wall.  Tapestries continue to cover portions of
the walls in this section of the hallway, depicting gruesome
catastrophes of nature and bestial destruction.

12436.name: {BStairwell To {BC{Yh{ya{Yo{Bs{X
description: {*The entrance to the very depths of destruction
{*and chaos appears as a rot-iron stairwell that
{*seems to buzz with electrical energy occasionaly
{*zaping the near by granite walls.{X

12409.name: {BHall of Bones{X
description: {*The bones crunch under your step, and the lingering odor of mildew
persists to choke your nostrils.  Small alcoves line the walls, hiding
other bodies and bones in rotted clothing.  More tapestries are hung
on the walls to the east and south, veiling the entrances to tombs and
other crypts.

{*little dagger and a long oak staff. Her body is

description:
{*A monsterous troll stands before you weilding the largest
{*maul that youve ever laid your eyes upon. His body is
{*covered in a black metal that seems to abosrb the light
{*that is present in the room. The large maul however glows
{*red and is decorated in gems. With a hefty grunt and a
{*swing the troll swings forward at you.  {x
